title: Rhone CEO on Changes in Shopper Behavior
itunes:title: Rhone CEO on Changes in Shopper Behavior
description:
Rhone CEO Nate Checketts discusses shifts in shopper behavior as more people are staying at home. He also points out how "digital main streets" and brands are evolving

Host: Carol Massar and Alix Steel. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
